texts: Rail for London Limited is a wholly owned subsidiary of Transport Trading Limited. It carries out the infrastructure upgrade for the North London line and enters into a concession agreement for the London Rail Concession.

This publication scheme covers Rail for London as well as London Rail which is the TfL Directorate responsible for overseeing major new rail projects, managing the London Rail concession and managing the operation of Docklands Light Railway and Tramlink.
